lead_paragraph: John Wooden’s 10 championships as U.C.L.A.’s coach will keep him in sports almanacs, but recent tributes demonstrate his legacy isn’t confined to the court.
snippet: John Wooden’s 10 championships as U.C.L.A.’s coach will keep him in sports almanacs, but recent tributes demonstrate his legacy isn’t confined to the court.
